snippet.title: NOROI KAGO: the Grudged Domain - Official Early Access Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
NOROI KAGO: the Grudged Domain is planned for a January 23, 2025 Early Access launch on Steam!


■Wishlist now on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1299060

■Follow on X(former:twitter)!
https://x.com/noroikago_en


NOROI KAGO: the Grudged Domain is a survival co-op horror game based around the theme of yokai. These are supernatural beings which stem from traditional Japanese folklore. The game allows for co-operative play for up to four players where the aim is to escape from an enclosed space in which yokai roam.


© Mizuki Productions・Toei Animation・Toydium Inc.
